item.title: How Long Does Tallow Balm Last? Shelf Life & Storage Tips
item.description: How Long Does Tallow Balm Last? Unlike commercial creams filled with preservatives, tallow balm NZ is a natural product with a long shelf lifeâ€”if stored correctly. 1. Shelf Life of Tallow Balm âœ” Lasts 6â€“12 months when stored at room temperature. âœ” Can last even longer if kept cool and dry. ðŸ’¡ The absence of water in tallow balm helps it stay fresh for months. 2.
